price: “Hooddannaan (milkii ilaallachuun) keessan isinumaa wajjin” jedhan. Sila yoo gorfamtanis (ni hooddattuu)? Akkasii miti Isinumatu ummata daangaa dabritoota” jedhan.
arabic: قَالُواْ طَٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمۡ أَئِن ذُكِّرۡتُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū ṭāirukum maʿakum a-in dhukkir'tum bal antum qawmun mus'rifūna
